p.k: LeGrange Muraille / Charm School's Out Ben, Gwen and Grandpa Max take a trek to the Great Wall, but their adventure is nearly ruined by daredevils LaGrange and Vin Ethanol. / During a family cookout at a forest campsite, Charmcaster users her magic to switch places with Gwen, but when Ben catches "Charmcaster" sneaking about, he attacks.
